org.apache.juneau.rest.response

Class InputStreamHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.juneau.rest.response.InputStreamHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ResponseHandler

    public final class InputStreamHandler
extends Object
implements ResponseHandler
    Response handler for InputStream objects.

    Simply pipes the contents of the InputStream to RestResponse.getNegotiatedOutputStream().

    Sets the Content-Type response header to whatever was set via ServletResponseWrapper.setContentType(String).

    See Also:
    • Overview > juneau-rest-server > Method Return Types

    • Method Detail

      • handle

        public boolean handle(RestRequest req,
                      RestResponse res,
                      Object output)
               throws IOException,
                      RestException
        Description copied from interface: ResponseHandler
        Process this response if possible. This method should return false if it wasn't able to process the response.
        Specified by:
        handle in interface ResponseHandler
        Parameters:
        req - The HTTP servlet request.
        res - The HTTP servlet response;
        output - The POJO returned by the REST method that now needs to be sent to the response.
        Returns:
        true If this handler handled the response.
        Throws:
        IOException - If low-level exception occurred on output stream. Results in a HttpServletResponse.SC_INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR error.
        RestException - If some other exception occurred. Can be used to provide an appropriate HTTP response code and message.
